location: Tingzhou Road Section 3, near Gonguan MRT Station (194m), Zhongzheng District
notes: Spacious 3BR/2BA elevator apartment near Gonguan MRT, recently renovated (within 3 years) with mid-range finishes. Pet-friendly with natural gas cooking, balcony, and full furnishings including AC, fridge, and washer. Good for a couple with baby: elevator access on 2F, large layout at 29.5 ping, eligible for rental subsidies, and located near NTU area with hospitals and markets nearby. Note the balcony should be inspected for railing safety, and the 2nd floor is convenient for stroller access. Listing is via agent (not direct landlord), so expect possible broker fees.
